initial_steps:
• Open Backup Utility in Workbench
 • 2. Connect to Platform of Niagara host
 • 3. Select running Station and click "Backup Station"
 • 4. Name backup with format: [CustomerName]_[YYYY-MM-DD]_PMBackup
acceptance_criteria: Backup completes; .dist opens without error; copy stored off-device
tools_required: Workbench, External storage drive, Cloud access
safety_tags: Ensure system stability during backup process\nVerify backup storage security
